entries.headline: Secret Garden & Vintage Vines
entries.blurb: Added support for hidden models in the registry and kept the legacy Claude vines growing for those who prefer the classics.

entries.headline: Polly's Brain Wave
entries.blurb: Swapped Polly's thinking cap for OpenAI embeddings. She's navigating the data garden with way more precision now.

entries.headline: Natural Chatter & Jetpacks
entries.blurb: Tweaked Polly's voice to be more breezy and natural, plus set up auto-deploy so she can fly out updates instantly.
